Please find the code/vignette files here:

[https://github.com/epiforecasts/scoringutils/tree/main/inst/manuscript](https://github.com/epiforecasts/scoringutils/tree/main/inst/manuscript).

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
tryCatch({
  dir <- tempdir()
  filepath <- file.path(dir, "manuscript.pdf")
  suppressWarnings(
    download.file(
      "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/epiforecasts/scoringutils/main/inst/manuscript/manuscript.pdf",
      mode = "wb",
      quiet = TRUE,
      destfile = filepath
    )
  )
}, finally = {
  if (file.exists(filepath)) {
    cat(
      "\\includepdf[pages={-}]{",
      filepath,
      "}",
      sep = ""
    )
  }
})
```
